summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2002 MACK CV713. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING 60 MPH, THE VEHICLE STALLED AND INDEPENDENTLY ENTERED IDLE MODE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A DEALER FOR A DIAGNOSTIC TEST. THE TEST RESULTS SHOWED A DEFECTIVE ELECTRICAL SYSTEM. THE DEALER UPGRADED THE SOFTWARE AND CHANGED THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL. NONE OF THE REPAIRS REMEDIED THE STALLING. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 250,000.
